mapper.update:
UPDATE toa_archive_document set
BACK_UP_ID = #{backUpId},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
MODEL = #{model},
DOC_ID = #{docId},
FOLDER_ID = #{folderId},
DOC_STATE = #{docState},
FILE_TYPE = #{fileType},
CONTENT_TYPE = #{contentType},
collect_ID = #{collectId},
DM_LINK = #{dmLink},
DM_NAME = #{dmName},
DM_ALIAS = #{dmAlias},
DM_LOCK_STATUS = #{dmLockStatus},
Physical_PATH = #{physicalPath},
DM_DIR = #{dmDir},
DM_TYPE = #{dmType},
DM_SUFFIX = #{dmSuffix},
WEIGHT = #{weight},
KM_TITLE = #{kmTitle},
DM_IN_RECYCLE = #{dmInRecycle},
KEY_WORDS = #{keyWords},
PERMISSION_VALUE = #{permissionValue},
AUTHOR = #{author},
CURRENT_VERSION = #{currentVersion},
DM_SIZE = #{dmSize},
SEQ = #{seq},
IS_VALID = #{isValid},
PI_ID = #{piId},
TABLE_NAME = #{tableName},
OPEN_DATE = #{openDate},
KM_END_TIME = #{kmEndTime},
KM_KEEP_TIME = #{kmKeepTime},
KM_REMIND = #{kmRemind},
KM_CONTENT = #{kmContent},
KM_CLICK_NUM = #{kmClickNum},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag}
where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT('公共文档_',LPAD(count(*)+1,8,0)) FROM toa_archive_document d WHERE YEAR(d.CREATE_DATE)=#{currentYear} and d.MODEL=#{model} and d.FILE_TYPE='0'
SELECT CONCAT('我的文档_',LPAD(count(*)+1,8,0)) FROM toa_archive_document d WHERE YEAR(d.CREATE_DATE)=#{currentYear} and d.MODEL=#{model} and d.FILE_TYPE='0'
